pages.text: Spell were specific methods and techniques for using spiritual. It's one of the basic ways for cultivators to increase their strength. Spells included active spells, passive spells, and special spells. Active spells needed to be triggered actively; passive spells could be triggered automatically as long as the trigger conditions were met; special spells did not need to be triggered after learning.

The secret manual of the cultivation method recorded the learning conditions and incantations of the spell. After meeting the required learning conditions, the corresponding spell could be learned. The learning requirements included realms, prerequisite spells, and specific spiritual roots.

To trigger spells, you first need to place them in the spell circle. Right-click on the cushion to see the spell circle on the spell page. Passive spells can be automatically detected and triggered as long as they are selected on the spell circle, while active spells can only be triggered if they are selected as preparatory spells and press the release button to trigger it.

There are two modes for selecting preparatory spells: wheel mode and movement mode. Movement mode is the initial default mode. Move mode requires long press circle button and move mouse to the direction of the spell you want to select. After the spell icon lights up, release circle button to select successfully. For wheel mode, press the circle button once to open the circle, and then switch spells by scroll mouse, and then press the circle button again to select.
